product_summary: ScreenApp is an AI-powered platform that helps you record, transcribe, summarize, and take notes from audio and video content. It offers a wide range of features, including a video teleprompter, webcam recorder, live caption tool, and AI voice recorder. ScreenApp is designed to save you time and effort by automating the process of note-taking and transcription.
product_cons: Limited features on the free plan
Customer support is not always responsive
